ticker.alpha: max(0, tanh(((abs(POS_X - PLAYER_X) + abs(POS_Z - PLAYER_Z)) / 5))) * ((( (PLAYER_X - POS_X)^2 + (PLAYER_Z - POS_Z)^2 ) <= (12.5 * 12.5)) * ((12.5 * 12.5) - ((PLAYER_X - POS_X)^2 + (PLAYER_Z - POS_Z)^2))) / (12.5 * 12.5 - 1*1) * ((0.3) * sin(0.025 * AGE))
ticker.remove_condition: max(0, min(((1 - ((abs(POS_X - PLAYER_X) + abs(POS_Z - PLAYER_Z)) / 20)^2)), ((1 - ((abs(POS_Y - PLAYER_Y)) / 20)^2)))) == 0
